C-SPAN does not receive one penny of taxpayer dollars. It is funded  primarily from satellite and cable providers.

Senator Klobuchar of Minnesota and I have introduced a bipartisan  resolution to recognize C-SPAN2 and the public service it provides the  American people through its live, nonpartisan coverage.…
